content:
Future

  • What is in the registry?

    • Domains, hosts, and registrar info
    • Registrar interaction with registry works across an ASCII protocol that is tunneled over SSL
    • Overview is at http://www.crsnic.net/documents/SRS_Overview_02.pdf

  • Who has helped create it?

    • NSI
    • Panel of Internet experts have convened to help critique it
